---
applyTo: "./cmd/**"
---

The command structure follows the directory structure:

cmd/
  atmunge/
    cmd/
      acct/
        acct.go
        analyze.go
        expand.go
        feed.go
        index.go
        query.go
        stats.go
        sync.go
      ai/
        ai.go
        chat.go
        complete.go
        embed.go
        explain.go
        hack.go
        reply.go
        safety.go
        summarize.go
        topics.go
      backfill/
        backfill.go
        describe-repo.go
        pds-accounts.go
        plc-logs.go
        repo-sync.go
      config.go
      db/
        clear.go
        db.go
        duckdb.go
        migrate.go
        reset.go
      plc/
        annotate.go
        plc.go
      repo/
        duckdb.go
        hack.go
        inspect.go
        ls.go
        mst.go
        repo.go
        sqlite.go
        sync.go
        unpack.go
        utils.go
      root.go
      run.go
    main.go
